snippet: Southampton midfielder Steven Davis is looking for a run of Premier League victories to boost the team's push for a European place and prevent the season from fizzling out....

headline.main: League Run Can Ignite Saints' European Dream, Says Davis
headline.print_headline: League Run Can Ignite Saints' European Dream, Says Davis

lead_paragraph: Southampton midfielder Steven Davis is looking for a run of Premier League victories to boost the team's push for a European place and prevent the season from fizzling out.

snippet: Failing to secure a Champions League spot will not affect Liverpool's transfer activities in the close season, manager Juergen Klopp has said....

headline.main: Champions League Will Not Affect Liverpool Transfer Plans-Klopp
headline.print_headline: Champions League Will Not Affect Liverpool Transfer Plans-Klopp

lead_paragraph: Failing to secure a Champions League spot will not affect Liverpool's transfer activities in the close season, manager Juergen Klopp has said.

snippet: West Ham United will begin their new era at the Olympic Stadium with a Europa League third qualifying round tie against either Belarus club Shakhtyor Soligorsk or Slovenian side NK Domzale....

headline.main: West Ham to Open Olympic Stadium With Europa League Qualifier
headline.print_headline: West Ham to Open Olympic Stadium With Europa League Qualifier

lead_paragraph: West Ham United will begin their new era at the Olympic Stadium with a Europa League third qualifying round tie against either Belarus club Shakhtyor Soligorsk or Slovenian side NK Domzale.

snippet: Liverpool's best chance of qualifying for the Champions League next season is to win the Europa League this year, manager Juergen Klopp has said....

headline.main: Liverpool Eye Europa League Route to Continental Riches
headline.print_headline: Liverpool Eye Europa League Route to Continental Riches

lead_paragraph: Liverpool's best chance of qualifying for the Champions League next season is to win the Europa League this year, manager Juergen Klopp has said.

snippet: Manchester United captain Wayne Rooney has been left out of the 18-man squad travelling to face Danish side FC Midtjylland in the Europa League on Thursday, the Premier League club said on their website (www.manutd.com)....

headline.main: Man United's Rooney Left Out of Europa League Squad
headline.print_headline: Man United's Rooney Left Out of Europa League Squad

lead_paragraph: Manchester United captain Wayne Rooney has been left out of the 18-man squad travelling to face Danish side FC Midtjylland in the Europa League on Thursday, the Premier League club said on their website (www.manutd.com).

snippet: The Los Angeles City Council has approved plans to build a $250 million stadium for Major League Soccer’s expansion Los Angeles Football Club....

headline.main: Los Angeles Soccer Stadium Wins Approval

lead_paragraph: The Los Angeles City Council has approved plans to build a $250 million stadium for Major League Soccer’s expansion Los Angeles Football Club.

snippet: England striker Jamie Vardy says Leicester City have no intention of treating the Champions League as some sort of belated Premier League victory parade, and are ready to add another chapter to last season's stunning success story....

headline.main: Vardy Lays Down Marker Before Champions League Debut
headline.print_headline: Vardy Lays Down Marker Before Champions League Debut

lead_paragraph: England striker Jamie Vardy says Leicester City have no intention of treating the Champions League as some sort of belated Premier League victory parade, and are ready to add another chapter to last season's stunning success story.

snippet: Yaya Toure has been left out of Manchester City's Champions League squad by coach Pep Guardiola, further undermining the Ivorian's position at the club....

headline.main: Toure Left Out of Man City's Champions League Squad
headline.print_headline: Toure Left Out of Man City's Champions League Squad

lead_paragraph: Yaya Toure has been left out of Manchester City's Champions League squad by coach Pep Guardiola, further undermining the Ivorian's position at the club.

snippet: Arsenal manager Arsene Wenger is refusing to write off his side's chances of lifting the Premier League trophy this season after Saturday's 2-2 draw with north London rivals Tottenham Hotspur left them eight points behind leaders Leicester City....

headline.main: Arsenal Will Not Give Up on League Title, Says Wenger
headline.print_headline: Arsenal Will Not Give Up on League Title, Says Wenger

lead_paragraph: Arsenal manager Arsene Wenger is refusing to write off his side's chances of lifting the Premier League trophy this season after Saturday's 2-2 draw with north London rivals Tottenham Hotspur left them eight points behind leaders Leicester City.

snippet: Midfielder Leon Britton is convinced that Premier League strugglers Swansea City can shrug off their sluggish start to the season as the Welsh club ended their run of four successive league defeats with a 0-0 draw against Watford in the weekend....

headline.main: Britton Positive Swansea Can Overcome Poor League Form
headline.print_headline: Britton Positive Swansea Can Overcome Poor League Form

lead_paragraph: Midfielder Leon Britton is convinced that Premier League strugglers Swansea City can shrug off their sluggish start to the season as the Welsh club ended their run of four successive league defeats with a 0-0 draw against Watford in the weekend.
